alert.note: Alert for Clay (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 12 at 10:55AM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 AM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt is expected. * WHERE...A portion of west central Minnesota, including the following counties, Clay and Wilkin. * WHEN...Until 1015 AM CDT Wednesday Apr 19. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1052 AM CDT, overland flooding was reported by emergency management across southeast Clay and parts of eastern Wilkin counties. Overland flooding will likely expand within rural parts of these counties as snow melt continues.
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service.
